                        Within thirty days after the end of the month in which the

                        Where tax is withheld from the interest paid or credited by
                     a prescribed person, life insurance company or the trustees of
                     a qualified unit trust scheme, a certificate of interest paid and
                     tax withheld shall be provided on request to the investor. The
                     certificate shall contain the following particulars-
